remarks: Value of the group inverse operation in a quotient group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qusgrp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
qusinv.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
qusinv.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
qusinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` H ) $.
qusinv $p |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` [ X ] ( G ~QG S ) ) = [ ( I ` X ) ] ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
